content: circular needles choose a length that is smaller than the finished bust size adjust needle size as necessary to match pattern gauge **gauge ** 24 sts x 34 row to 10cm in stocking stitch on larger needles row gauge isn t too crucial **extras ** 3 stitch markers in the round version stitch holders or scrap yarn for holding stitches darning needle 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tip-top-tank-3
